sentences.en: Children's books often depict farmyard animals as gentle, lovable creatures.
sentences.cn: 儿童图书常常把农场的动物描写得温和而可爱。
他真是个讨人喜欢的小坏蛋!

sentences.en: His vulnerability makes him even more lovable.
sentences.cn: 他的脆弱反倒让他更加讨人喜欢。

sentences.en: I have a lovable Beijing puppy, the name call'shasha "
sentences.cn: 我有一只可爱的北京小狗, 名叫 “ 沙沙 ”

sentences.en: It's doubtless that there are many lovable things in the year round.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,在这四季中,有许多可爱的东西.

sentences.en: Maybe there's a certain distance from which I am lovable.
sentences.cn: 也许在一定的距离之外,我是可爱的.

sentences.en: Moreover she has naive small face, is still super lovable.
sentences.cn: 而且她那天真无邪的小脸, 依然超级可爱.

sentences.en: Nor is President Sun lovable for this reason alone.
sentences.cn: 孙院长的可爱,还不止此.
我们是可爱的动物 吗 ?

sentences.en: She is the most lovable among all girls.
sentences.cn: 所有姑娘中她是最可爱的.

sentences.en: The flowers in the peony exhibition are so gorgeous and lovable.
sentences.cn: 牡丹花展,株株绚丽多姿,惹人喜欢.

sentences.en: The most lovable and hateful thing in him is his punctuality.
sentences.cn: 他这个人最可爱和最可恨的一点都是他的守时.

sentences.en: The river rock edge is opening the lovable blue floret.
sentences.cn: 河岩边开着可爱的蓝色小花.

sentences.en: Those white and black giant pandas are gentle and lovable, though.
sentences.cn: 那些皮色黑白相间的大熊猫温顺可爱.

words.tran_cn: 恋爱；亲爱的；酷爱；喜爱的事物
